thread.section_title: Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very helpful staff and nice location
thread.title_full: A very helpful staff and nice location - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rohit S
title: A very helpful staff and nice location
text:
I am impressed with the staff. They really helped me a lot. Very humble and responsive.
I stayed for a day only. Liked the room and facilities.If they start providing Slippers that would be good especially during winter season.
Located nearby many tourists spot. Empire State building and New York highline are just walking distance.
Overall it is a good comforting hotel to stay in new York.
